Where do I put the APK file? Can I have a really quick step-by-step please? From anybody that got it to work?

OK, too help here is how you install

1: put the APK in any file you can find VIA your Android Cell/Pad and install it!

2: Make the Obb file on the SD card

3: Move the Obb file to the Cell/pads internal Android folder. 

4: Play the damn Game and enjoy it!
Thanks for the detailed Instruction how to install it ^_^
